text: The Wiley Cares Campaign is a multi-tiered campaign launched to ensure the holistic success of our students as they matriculate at Wiley College. Affording a college degree is a challenge faced nationwide as well as here at Wiley. We’ve reduced tuition to make a quality education more accessible to all. This reduction beginning in Fall 2020 will make Wiley the most affordable historically black institution in the state. Get more information about the Wiley Cares Campaign and learn how you can be apart of it.
Stay up to date on everything Wiley

Wiley College is a four-year, privately-supported, historically black college/university (HBCU) located on the west side of Marshall, Texas. Wiley College holds distinction as one of the oldest historically black colleges west of the Mississippi River.

Educating students who are prepared for leadership and service when they graduate. Service to humankind is encouraged and nurtured at Wiley. This four-year, liberal arts institution was founded in 1873 by the Freedman’s Aid Society of the Methodist Episcopal Church. Located in Marshall, Texas, we are a faith-based Community of Learners, where scholarship and service go hand-in-hand.
Educating Students for more than 150 Years.

Undergraduates at Wiley College are multi-talented and motivated individuals committed to succeed. When you become a Wildcat, you can begin to take advantage of our first-class academic programs, beautiful campus, and outstanding faculty. Don’t take our word for it, discover what it means to live and study at one the best private Institutions in the state of Texas.
We understand that funding your education is a significant financial investment for you and your family.
Apply as an undergraduate freshman and take your first step into a rewarding future.
Applicants can re-enroll by applying and recommitting yourself to excellence!
Get ready for an energizing, engaging and enriching Summer Bridge experience that will place you ahead of the class!
Apply as an international student and enhance your educational experience.
Make the switch to Wiley and ensure a brighter future.

More information to get you on your way
If you have any questions or concerns please do not hesitate to contact us via email at
or phone (903) 927-3311, and thank you for choosing Wiley College on your academic journey into success.

Find out why everyone is Wild About Wiley! Become a prospective student to receive information on upcoming events and important updates for you and your family. Contact us directly! We’re eager to speak with you.
We encourage prospective undergraduates and their families to visit the Wiley College campus, located in East Texas. Use the calendar to check availability and request a campus tour date.
Campus Tours will not be available from October 24th – November 17th
